data.prayer: Please, teach the 261,960 believers in Kirinyaga, Kenya how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kirinyaga, Kenya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Kirinyaga words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kirinyaga with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: There are 528,100 people living in the state of Kirinyaga. Only about 261,960 might be believers.
Lord, please remember the Chinese, general people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Kirinyaga.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 261,960 believers in Kirinyaga against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kirinyaga, Kenya has a population of 528,100.

We estimate Kirinyaga has 261,960 people who might know Jesus, 159,606 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 106,534 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kirinyaga do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Kirinyaga
location.people_groups_list: Munyoyaya, Arab, Hadrami, Midgan, Gujarati Creole, Orma
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Munyoyaya (2,100), Arab, Hadrami (13,000), Midgan (2,600), Gujarati Creole (2,100), Orma (85,000)
